profile.name: Zahra Fattahi
profile.title: Frontend Developer
profile.bio: Hello, here's who I am & what I do
profile.description: I am a dedicated Frontend Developer with extensive experience in creating dynamic, user-friendly web applications using modern technologies. Proficient in React, Vue, and Nuxt, I build responsive and intuitive interfaces with a strong command of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. My expertise in Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap enables me to design visually appealing layouts. Committed to continuous learning and collaboration, I excel in team environments, working closely with designers and developers to deliver high-quality, innovative solutions.

education.description: Alzahra University ranked 17 in Iran and 801 worldwide according to the physical sciences subject ranking. Graduated with a GPA of 7.5.
Currently pursuing a Master's degree with a thesis titled 'Using Data Mining for Network Intrusion Detection'. Expected to graduate by the end of August 2024.

details.title: Interdepartmental Collaboration
details.description: Facilitated effective communication and collaboration between SEO and frontend teams, ensuring seamless alignment of goals and expectations and cut down paperwork by 75%.

details.title: Design Pattern Implementation
details.description: Implemented industry-recognized design patterns to optimize code structure, enhancing maintainability, scalability, and reusability by 35%; reduced bug-fixing time by 40% and increased development efficiency by 30%.

details.title: Crypto Industry Proficiency
details.description: Delved into the cryptocurrency domain to deepen understanding and support the company's related projects, enhancing the ability to contribute meaningfully to crypto-focused initiatives.

details.title: Performance Enhancement
details.description: Successfully integrated plugins into the website, significantly improving code efficiency and streamlining process times, resulting in a 25% reduction in page load times and increased user engagement.

details.title: Content Management
details.description: Took charge of adding new content and creating landing pages for newly introduced coins on the website, contributing to the platform's up-to-date and engaging offerings, resulting in a 40% increase in user interactions with the new content.

details.title: Responsive Design Implementation
details.description: Executed responsive design principles within the Nuxt project, delivering a consistent user experience across various devices and screen sizes.

details.title: Community Building
details.description: Spearheaded the creation of a vibrant community of over 30 frontend developers through meetups and virtual forums. This platform fostered collaboration, facilitated knowledge sharing, and cultivated a strong sense of teamwork.

details.title: Framework Mastery
details.description: Mastered multiple frontend frameworks including Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and Vuetify, showcasing adaptability and enabling the creation of visually appealing and responsive user interfaces for diverse projects.

details.title: Continuous Improvement Advocate
details.description: Advocated for and facilitated the adoption of best practices, resulting in a substantial 60% improvement in code quality and operational efficiency across the team's projects, leading to a 15% reduction in bug reports from quality assurance.

details.title: Methodological Consistency
details.description: Implemented BEM methodology for CSS in a recent project, resulting in a modular and organized structure. This streamlined collaboration, reduced development time by 20%, and lowered CSS-related bugs. The approach facilitated targeted updates, enhancing both code quality and delivery efficiency.

details.title: Teaching and Examination Assistance
details.description: Assisted in teaching and evaluating advanced computer programming in Java and Python, providing guidance to students on complex coding concepts and projects.

details.title: Advanced Algorithm Class Assistant
details.description: Served as a teacher's assistant for an Advanced Algorithm class for two semesters, offering support to students in understanding and implementing intricate algorithmic techniques.

details.title: Machine Learning Class Assistant
details.description: Worked as a teacher's assistant for a Machine Learning class, helping students grasp the principles and applications of machine learning in real-world scenarios.
